p.k: The park manager wants to prove that he was once a world-renowned drummer in a band, as nobody believes him! / Muscle Man can’t wait to celebrate his one year anniversary with his girlfriend, but he gets a bad haircut and has to spend the evening trying to hide it! / The staff welcome Thomas as the new groundskeeper, with a string of well-humoured pranks for his initiation. But, Muscle Man takes the pranks too far! / Poor Pops is left out of ‘guy’s night’, so he tries to prove he is one of the guys by drinking a whole gallon of milk in an hour…
